name: Adrian Johnstone
content: Adrian Johnstone - Royal Holloway Research Portal Adrian Johnstone Professor Professor of Computing, Department of Computer ScienceCentre for Software Language EngineeringCentre for Programming Languages and Systems https://orcid.org/0000-0002-9446-9701 Phone+44 1784 443425EmailA.Johnstonerhul.acuk TW20 0EX Personal profile Research interestsProgramming language theory and implementation Babbage History of Computing Expertise related to UN Sustainable Development Goals In 2015, UN member states agreed to 17 global Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for all.
